What's Bitget?

Bitget is a leading global cryptocurrency exchange that specializes in derivatives trading. The platform offers a comprehensive suite of trading services including:

  • Spot trading with competitive fees
  • Futures trading with up to 125x leverage
  • Advanced trading features and tools
  • Copy trading functionality

API Key Setup Process

follow the steps below to configure your API Keys.

{% include 'include/warnings.html' with warning="Never share your API keys with anyone. We use industry-standard encryption to secure your credentials." %}

1 Create a Bitget Account

If you donâ€™t already have a Bitget account, please sign up here.

2 Navigate to API Keys

  1. Log in to your Bitget account.
  2. Click on your profile icon in the top-right corner.
  3. Select "API Keys" from the dropdown menu.

3 Create API Key

  1. Click "Create API Key"
  2. Choose "System generated"
  3. Give your API key a descriptive name in the Note.
  4. Set a Passphrase.

4 Configure Security Settings

  1. Under "Permissions" select "Read-write"
  2. Under "Permission Type" tick "Name"
  3. Scroll down and Add the server's IP address: {{server_ip}}
  4. Click "Next" to get your API Keys.

IMPORTANT: Ensure you copy your secret key before clicking Confirm.

Complete Integration

Once you have your API keys, return to our platform's Automate section and use them to link your Binance account with our automation system. This will enable automated trading based on your TradingView alerts.
